scheme_name: A Scheme to Provide Assistance for Building E-Market Facilities in Market Committees
nodal_department: Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department
brief_description: This scheme provides financial assistance to market committees in Gujarat to establish e-market facilities, aligning with the National Agriculture Market Policy for a unified national e-market.
detailed_description: "A Scheme to Provide Assistance for Building E-Market Facilities in Market Committees" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to support market committees to set up e-market facilities, enhancing transparency and efficiency in agricultural marketing across the state.
benefits: Financial Assistance: ₹1,00,000/- (One Lakh Rupees) per eligible market committee.
eligibility_criteria: Co-operative Market Committees shall be eligible under this scheme. The committee must operate within Gujarat.

steps: Step 1: Fill in the application form on plain paper as per the instructions. Step 2: Attach all required documents. Step 3: Submit the completed application to the District Registrar for processing.

documents_required: Proof of cooperative market committee registration. Details of the proposed e-market facility setup. Any other documents as required.
